author: domboy
title: Long extension cable - thank you Lego!
review: This "set" is very important and I'm very happy Lego sells the part seperate from a set: two  of these long (20-inches/50 cm) extension cables are needed to build 4999 Vestas Wind Turbine, and since Lego never released this exclusive set to the general public, 8871 extension cable is needed by anyone desiring to gather the parts needed to construct the aforementioned 4999 set. So thank you Lego for at least providing us with all the required parts! I bought my two 8871 Extension Cables, and they work great!

author: J14T14
title: "Extending" Your Collection Even Further
review: This set is a great thing to get if you are into power functions sets. There is nothing too special except that it is great for betting lights or motors to places farther away from the battery box than you could normally go. I wanted to build a motorized and lit up LEGO city, so these were great for me.
